plot: A serial killer brutally slays and dismembers several gay men in New York's S&M and leather districts. The young police officer Steve Burns is sent undercover onto the streets as decoy for the murderer. Working almost completely isolated from his department, he has to learn and practice the complex rules and signals of this little society. While barely seeing his girlfriend Nancy anymore, the work starts changing him.

m.role:
Cruising, starring Al Pacino, is about a cop chasing a gay serial killer through the New York City Leatherman community, circa 1980. It's implied that being around S&M turns Pacino's character gay, and possibly murderous as well.
 The film did have a disclaimer at the start that the movie was not in any way representative of all gay men, to try to calm the protests that arose after its premiere.

name: Cruising
